question.text: Most suitable reason why SA node act as pacemaker for heart.

options.text: It is located in the right atrium.
It is made up of neural tissue.
It is first to generate the nerve impulse.
It can generate the maximum number of action potentials per unit time.

solution.text:
Sino-atrial node (SAN) - SAN is a patch of nodal tissue present in the right upper corner of the right atrium.

It can generate the maximum number of action potentials : 70 - 75 / min. It is also termed as the pacemaker because it is responsible for initiating and maintaining the rhythmic contractile activity of the heart. Normal heart rate = 70-75 times in a minute (72 beats/min).
